title: Mastery Points Icon Blocking Number?

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body: The mastery icon is blocking part of the mastery points after patch 9.2 or something like that? Should be an easy fix Riot, not game breaking, but sure is annoying. Thanks.

replies.body: This is a known issue, the team is working on a fix. :)
yea ever since the loading screen update this has been a problem.
Thank you for posting about this, it's super annoying! I meant to make a thread about it myself, but never got around to it.
157 mastery points and already lv 7, damn!
